text: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

translation.en: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how was the end of the criminals
translation.id: Katakanlah (Muhammad), "Berjalanlah kamu di bumi, lalu perhatikanlah bagaimana kesudahan orang-orang yang berdosa
